metadata.synopsis: After leaving Ketheric's throne room after Ketheric's defeat, a player character comments on what they need to do next - head for Baldur's Gate.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use "oe SCE_SetupDebrief" or use the debugbook to go to act 2 region "Epilogue".- Enter the trigger S_SCE_PartyVB_ToBaldursGate_Trigger_9013deb2-3947-4999-9204-d42cffcbf11a outside of the throne room

0.speaker: Player
0.text: The road to Baldur's Gate is west of the town. If we hurry, we'll arrive before the Absolute's forces.
